ygData.subject: Re: Home, Jeeves!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Prowl look sin surprise at Iron Raptor after recieving her answer. He didn t mean it that way, he had just pointed out that it shouldn t be taken lightly.

::Prowl::

Prowl look sin surprise at Iron Raptor after recieving her answer. He 
didn't mean it that way, he had just pointed out that it shouldn't be 
taken lightly. -Allright, love. I never said you're stupid.- he 
thinks to her and shuts up, deciding that trying to make his point 
further would not be in his best interests.

He frowns, hearing her thoughts about second guessing. He was used to 
being a strategy adviser and giving advice; it was second nature to 
him. Prowl also hears Iron Raptor's intentions of making the Maximals 
rival the Alliance. It could probably be pulled off, with a whole lot 
of organizing.

Prowl watches Shadow Cat and Snow Tech land. He was anxious to get 
back to base and help with the battle. For all he knew, the Maximals 
could be dying right now!



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> 
> * Iron Raptor had watched her firneds calm a bit, then place the 
small 
> bundle of fur in her hands. Looking down at the little fuzz ball as 
he 
> stretched out to the contours of her hand. He was cute, she had to 
admit.
> But now wasn;t the time to get a gushy. There were serious things 
to be done 
> now, and number 1 was get back to base with her fiends in tow.
> But then Iron Raptor heardProwls thoughts on what she had said, her 
eyes 
> narrowing as she heard his commant on the idea.*
> < And how am I supposed to take it? Like Snadow Cat and Snow Tech 
handled 
> the new of the advancing threat? I KNOW what the Alliance can 
do,Prowl. I'm 
> not stupid! I just said that they could handle it until we got 
there, and 
> that's not long. So quit getting worked up. Being over anxious can 
only lead 
> to defeat.>
> 
> * Iron Raptor looked towards Prowl for a moment with a look that 
basically 
> backed up her thoughts.
> She was suck of being second guessed, and she wasn't stupid enough 
to not 
> know that theCybertronian Fire and the Maximals under her command 
were under 
> attack.
> But Iron Raptors hands closed around the small bundle of life in 
her hands 
> as he began to wriggle.*
> 
> " They probably aren't. I detected a ship less then 100 clicks from 
> here,new. Just landed. Probably where they're from."
> 
> *Motioning with her head towards the crashing which had grown 
closer.
> But then Iron Raptor watches as both of her friends disappear into 
flight 
> and the sky...cocking an eye-brow.
> Wasn't it less then 2 min ago that they were the ones who were 
telling both 
> Prowl and herself to leave...and now they were leaving them behind?
> Iron Raptor sighed. Those two could be so weird sometimes.
> But then a sound reached Iron Raptors ears as her friends 
disappeared, a 
> small hissing noise that was there and went away.
> She looked down at her hand where the small cat was laying, looking 
up at 
> her with big eyes and licking her hand.
> Seeing the embarrasmant in his expression.*
> 
> " You little bugger...."
> 
> * She knew what he had done, and it wasn't very pleasent.
> Must be the food Snow Tech and Shadow Cat fed him.
> Iron Raptor doesn't move as Prowl comes up to her and slides an arm 
around 
> him, still slightly peeved at him for his last commant.*
> 
> < I know....>
> 
> * She adds, simply standing sill and clutching the small fuzz ball 
to in her 
> arms, ready to leave.
> But she was sick of all these attacks, and as soon as she got the 
Maximals 
> into order after this, they would turn out to be a force that the 
Alliance 
> would think twice about attacking next time.*
> 
>
